inscription: in graphite, entire sheet: Dear STEVE: I LOVE THE WAY THE TATOO ARTIST CAME OUT, AND THE RATS THE CATS PAJAMA'S TOO. GREAT WORK VERMILLION. I'LL CALL YOU TO GET MY SIGNALS STRAIGHT ON THE PANCAKE EATER. HOPE LL IS WELL WITH YOU THERE. Best to the GANG
title: Letter to Steve Andersen
